Articles.Content:
Greetings all. I\'m new to the game and (obviously) new to the forums but I\'d just like to once again throw the idea of a multiplayer project out there.

Unfortunately I\'m not a Windows guy but I could throw my weight behind the server side. So are there any C#/unity/other guys out there interested in working something up?

Thanks fellas, but I was under the impression that project was closed? I was in the chat and a few folks (at least one dev) told me they were banned and no longer wanted to work on the project.

I wanted to reboot the issue but it appears like there aren\'t many c#/unity people interested so it looks like this may die.

trbinsc - if you run into people willing to do client side stuff get a hold of me - I\'d probably still be interested in doing server side code.
